title: the length of any item in padded_sequence should be greater than 0
body_html: If we feed a lengths list whose minimal value is not greater than 0, we will get wrong packed result, because the body of the while loop in line 69 (while step == current_length:) may never run. For example, if the minimal length is 0, then the initial value of 'current_length' will be 0, while the initial value of 'step' is 1, so the while test will never be True and the body of the while loop will never run.

body: If we feed a lengths list whose minimal value is not greater than 0, we will get wrong packed result, because the body of the while loop in line 69 (while step == current_length:) may never run. For example, if the minimal length is 0, then the initial value of 'current_length' will be 0, while the initial value of 'step' is 1, so the while test will never be True and the body of the while loop will never run.
